text: Superbe bouteille de 300ml. Le liquide de ce saké est transparent, de belles larmes se forment sur le verre. Le nez a des vapeurs dalcool qui parsèment le riz. La bouche a un peu trop dalcool chaud, des poires sy mêlent et du miel. Ce saké est chaleureux.

Strong koji aroma, cheesy. Clear and almost colorless, slight yellow hue. Sweet honey and honeydew melon flavor. Nondescript tanginess toward the end. Alcohol is quite noticeable, strong warming effect. Medium body. Im not real crazy about

No head. This was the best sake that ive ever rated. This must have been an outstanding year for rice. Smells great.  Many other sakes have a harsh taste, but this is very smooth. I would enjoy drinking this for a while. Yum. Now if only i had some suchi. You see, the problem is that this junk hurricane is keeping me indoors and I cant get sushi because the rain is keeping me inside. Dont worry though internet, I have ample amounts of alcohol to get me through these tough times.

Poured very clear.  Aroma of melon with some berries.  Taste is very smooth and sweet with lots of melon and apples.  Nice light fruity tastes.  Finish is smooth and slightly sweet.  Also some rice and alcohol.  Overall great.

Partagé avec French tickler et Agaguk. Acheté à la SAQ en format de 720ml et dit meilleur avant le 08-09-25. Apparence de couleur eau clair sans mousse et sans carbonation. Arômes similaire au vodka avec un ajoux de sel et de coconut avec une touche de mente. Goût de melon miel, de sel et de riz. Même si le liquide est clair comme de leau de roche il est quand même dense en bouche. Un bon saké mais il en a des meilleurs.

720ml Bottle shared with French Tickler and Grand Genie.  Water appearance, no head and no carbonation visual.  Aroma:  salted water, cocnut, alcohol (Vodka).  Flavor: mint, a mix of white wine and Vodka but mostly vodka.  Palate: light, thin, oily and no carbonation.  This would be an excelent drink to serve with olives to your guests insted of a Martini.

Shared with grand genie and agaguk.  Apparence eau claire avec aucun collet... Style vodka.  Arome de riz, amande, melon miel, amidons, gallette de sarazin... juste un peu trop bizarre pour moi.  Vodka, vodka, vodka, alcohol, vodka, eau sallée.  Texture dun vin blanc diluée.  Je naime pas dutout ce style donc la cote en reflete grandement.  Serais-ce trop froid?  Gout de vin blanc diluée, alcohol et riz blanc.  Beurk.

Chilled bottle from Party Town.

Poured clear straw color with fair legs. Moderate coconut and melons aroma. Medium body with a smooth texture. Medium apple and rice flavor with a medium dry and warming finish of moderate duration.

My expectations were met with a smooth sake.

Pours clear with a flouresent glow and some decent legs. Aroma is honey dew, and fruit that is past its prime (sweet and pungent). TAste is amazingly smooth. Goes down like thick pure water but with a bit of an alcoholic bite. Great sake.

Uploaded info and picture. Pours with a clear, but slightly green tinged body with some legs. Aroma is of rotten pineapple, banana and melon. Velvety smooth mouthfeel. Slight alcohol imbalance on the taste.
